alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:41PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Cluster of thunderstorms lifting northeast into southwestern Cassia County and the Graham Peak Fire area through 530 PM MDT... At 436 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 15 miles east of Rogerson to near Oakley Reservoir to 25 miles southwest of Oakley to 30 miles southeast of Jackpot, moving northeast at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph, pea to half inch hail, heavy rain, and occasionally lighting. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects, and create difficult fire fighting conditions on area fires. Locations impacted include... Oakley Reservoir, Oakley, and Bostetter Ranger Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Fire crews working near the Graham Peak fire should prepare for strong, gusty and erratic thunderstorm outflow winds.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
